title: Average retail price for regular gasoline at self-service stations in Canada 2021
summary: The graph shows the Average retail price for regular gasoline in Canada 2021 .
The lowest Average is in Jannuary .
From February till July the graph oscillate .
gold: This graph shows the average retail price for regular gasoline at self-service stations in Canada during 2021 . It shows that the price started at a low of just over 110 Cents/litre . It steadily increased until October , where it reached a high of about 146 Cents/litre .
